sourcesContent:
<app-cabecera titulo="GRID PAGE"></app-cabecera>
<ion-content>
    <ion-grid fixed>
        <ion-row>
            <ion-col size="12" size-lg="3" size-md="4" size-sm="6" *ngFor="let i of [1,1,1,1]">
                <ion-card>
                    <ion-img src="/assets/prueba.jpg"></ion-img>
                    <ion-card-header>
                        <ion-card-subtitle>Card Subtitle</ion-card-subtitle>
                        <ion-card-title>Card Title</ion-card-title>
                    </ion-card-header>

                    <ion-card-content>
                        Keep close to Nature's heart... and break clear away, once in awhile, and climb a mountain or spend a week in the woods. Wash your spirit clean.
                    </ion-card-content>
                </ion-card>
            </ion-col>

        </ion-row>
    </ion-grid>
</ion-content>
